text: Wilelm kyng gret Osmund bisceop of Seorbyrig & Robert of Eli & Pieðres of Ualoniis & ealle his scirgereuan & his holdan frencisce & englisce frendlisce.
And ic kyðe eow þæt ic habbe gegyuen Maurice bisceope of Lundene þæne castel of Estorteford & alle þa land þe William biscop is forgenga of me hæfde.
And eac halle þe land þæt William þe diacon & Raulf his broðer of me healdeð & habbeð.
And forðan ic wille þæt ge don þæt Maurices biscoep ealle þas þing & ealle þa oðre þing þe he hafed on eower sciran stranglice & weorðlice healde & hæbbe.
And ic wille þæt he beo his saca weorðe & his socna & his lagana weorðe swa swa Williames biscop betst wæs.
